programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Deus Existe e Vive em Bruxelas
programme.desc: Deus existe! Vive em Bruxelas, é um estupor e maltrata a mulher e a filha. Sabemos muito do seu filho, mas pouco da filha. Chama-se Ea e tem 10 anos. Um dia, revolta-se contra o pai, entra no computador dele e revela a toda a gente o tempo que lhe resta.

programme.title: Rainha de Copas
programme.desc: Anne, uma bem-sucedida advogada, vive com as suas duas filhas e o marido Peter. Mas quando Gustav, o filho problemático de Peter de uma relação anterior, vai viver com eles, Anne cria uma relação íntima com o jovem, pondo em risco a sua vida perfeita.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 - Outro Susto de Filme
programme.desc: Acabada de sair da faculdade, Cindy trabalha agora na televisão. Por seu lado, a sua melhor amiga morre misteriosamente ao ver uma cassete e estranhos círculos começam a aparecer na quinta de Tom. Entretanto, Cindy descobre que os alienígenas planeiam uma invasão à Terra.

programme.title: Eu. Escrava
programme.desc: Um filme que retrata o mundo do tráfico de escravos em Londres, através da história de uma jovem em luta pela sua liberdade. Historia verídica baseada na vida de Mende Nazer, atualmente uma escritora e ativista pelos Direitos Humanos.

programme.title: Valquíria
programme.desc: Ao ver Hitler precipitar a Alemanha e a Europa para o caos, o coronel Stauffenberg começa a acreditar que é preciso travá-lo. Em 1943, quando recupera de ferimentos sofridos em combate, reúne forças junto da Resistência Alemã e organiza uma conspiração para matar Hitler: a "Operação Valquíria".

programme.title: Platoon - Os Bravos do Pelotão
programme.desc: Chris Taylor, um jovem e ingénuo americano, decide alistar-se como voluntário para combater na Guerra do Vietname. Chris pertence a um pelotão comandado pelo sargento Elias Grodin, um homem conhecedor e humanitário, e pelo sanguinário sargento Robert Barnes.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Jules e Vincent, dois assassinos, tentam recuperar uma mala roubada de Marsellus Wallace. Este pede ainda a Vincent para tomar conta da mulher, Mia. Butch, um pugilista, é pago por Wallace para perder um combate. Já Honey Bunny e Pumpkin, um casal de pequenos ladrões, quer uma mudança de sítio.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: 6 Dias
programme.desc: Em abril de 1980, homens armados invadiram a Embaixada do Irão, em Londres. A história verdadeira dos seis dias de terror aquando da ocupação, que resultou em 26 reféns.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Seus Olhos
programme.desc: Uma equipa de investigadores do FBI vê-se dividida, quando descobre que a filha da agente Jess foi assassinada. Treze anos depois, após uma obsessiva busca pelo assassino, surge uma nova pista. Mas ninguém está preparado para um inconfessável segredo.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Listo, Steven DePaul, David Straiton, Michael Patrick Jann, Allison Liddi-Brown

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

I hope they will come back to bring the show to its former status."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.desc: Em 480 A.C., o rei de Esparta enfrenta o poderoso exército persa no desfiladeiro das Termópilas. No entanto, uma traição ensombra a confiança cega dos gregos na vitória.

programme.title: 300: O Início de um Império
programme.desc: O general grego Themistokles tenta unir toda a Grécia ao liderar um ataque que mudará o curso da guerra. Mas o campo de batalha é novo: o mar.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: Jane é uma agente do FBI que une forças com um caçador local, atormentado pelo passado, para investigar um homicídio ocorrido numa Reserva de Nativos Americanos. No decorrer da investigação, Jane espera vingar a morte da vítima, uma jovem rapariga.

programme.title: Inimigos Públicos
programme.desc: A polícia federal inicia uma caça ao homem na tentativa de capturar alguns dos gangsters mais famosos dos Estados Unidos, nos anos 30: John Dillinger, "Baby Face" Nelson e "Pretty Boy" Floyd.

programme.title: G.I. Joe - O Ataque dos Cobra
programme.desc: A equipa de elite G.I. Joe é dotada da mais avançada tecnologia de espionagem e equipamento militar para enfrentar um traficante de armas, bem como a crescente ameaça das misteriosa organização dos Cobra de forma a evitar que o mundo se afunde no caos.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliação
programme.desc: A equipa dos G.I. Joe volta para enfrentar, mais uma vez, os Cobra, bem como perigosas novas ameaças dentro do Governo. Incriminados por um crime terrível, mas que não cometeram, só lhes resta uma opção: retaliação.

programme.title: Assalto a Londres
programme.desc: O funeral do primeiro-ministro britânico torna-se o evento mais protegido de sempre, mas também uma oportunidade para matar líderes poderosos. Apenas três pessoas o podem impedir: o presidente dos EUA, os Serviços Secretos americanos e um agente do MI6.

programme.title: O Herói de Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond Doss foi o único soldado americano que, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, lutou na frente de batalha sem estar armado, acreditando que matar era errado. Como médico do Exército, evacuou, sozinho, os feridos que tinham ficado em território inimigo.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blood Father - O Protetor
programme.desc: Link, um ex-presidiário, está determinado a proteger a sua filha de 17 anos de um perigoso cartel de droga que a quer matar. E de, pela primeira vez na sua vida, fazer o que está certo...

IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Mike Listo, Steven DePaul, David Straiton, Michael Patrick Jann, Allison Liddi-Brown

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: A meio de uma carreira na vanguarda do jazz moderno, Miles Davis afasta-se abruptamente da vida pública. Sozinho em casa, Miles é atormentado por dores, pela sua voz musical entorpecida por drogas e pela mente assombrada por fantasmas do passado.

programme.title: 21: A Última Cartada
programme.desc: Para pagar o curso de Medicina, Ben, um sobredotado do MIT, tenta fazer dinheiro em jogos de cartas. Ele acaba por se juntar à equipa secreta do seu professor de matemática, que, contando cartas e usando um complexo sistema de sinais, consegue "quebrar" vários casinos.

programme.title: Mulher de Ouro
programme.desc: A notável história verídica da jornada da judia Maria Altmann para recuperar o seu património e justiça para a família. Sessenta anos depois de ter fugido de Viena, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a mulher tenta recuperar os bens da família, que foram apreendidos pelos nazis.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos 2
programme.desc: Amy, Travis e Graham são estudantes de cinema na Universidade de Alpine. Num ambiente de forte competividade, é convocado o prestigiado prémio Hitchcock para o melhor fime, como tese de final de curso. Quando começam a rodar o filme, dão-se estranhos e terroríficos acidentes.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: Anaconda - Rasto de Sangue
programme.desc: Neste quarto episódio da saga "Anacondas", Murdoch, um poderoso magnata com pouco tempo de vida, programa uma experiência com néctar de orquídeas sanguíneas com propriedades regeneradoras e testa-o numa cria de Anaconda.

programme.title: Manchester By The Sea
programme.desc: A vida do solitário Lee Chandler é irreversivelmente transformada quando volta à sua cidade natal para cuidar do sobrinho. Patrick ficou órfão e Lee foi nomeado tutor do jovem de 16 anos. Mas além das dificuldades evidentes que tem pela frente, o regresso de Lee vai ainda reabrir feridas antigas.

programme.title: Predador 2
programme.desc: Vem de uma galáxia distante para caçar e deixa um rasto de cadáveres na sua passagem. Em estado de sítio devido a uma guerra entre gangues, Los Angeles é o campo de caça perfeito para o Predador. O tenente Mike Harrigan decide investigar e coloca-se frente a frente do enigmático alienígena.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: O fotógrafo Dennis Stock tenta aproximar-se do ator em ascensão James Dean, a fim de conseguir um grande destaque para a revista Life. No entanto, James não lhe torna a tarefa fácil.

programme.title: DragonHeart: Coração de Dragão
programme.desc: Nos tempos antigos, quando majestosos respiradores de fogo sobrevoavam os céus, Bowen fica face a face e coração a coração com o último dragão na Terra, Draco. Enquanto tenta travar um rei tirano, Bowen percebe que a tarefa será mais difícil do que imaginou: se matar o rei, Draco também morrerá.

programme.title: Outbreak - Fora de Controlo
programme.desc: O coronel Daniels e a sua equipa de investigadores, especializada em doenças infetocontagiosas, encontram numa aldeia do Zaire uma epidemia devastadora. De regresso aos Estados Unidos, trabalham dia e noite para isolar o vírus e descobrir a sua origem.

programme.title: Passageiros
programme.desc: Uma nave espacial, com destino a uma colónia distante, tem um problema nas câmaras de sono e dois passageiros, Aurora Lane e Jim Preston, acordam 90 anos antes da chegada ao destino. Ameaçados pelo iminente colapso da nave, tentam descobrir o porquê de terem acordado.

programme.title: The Hunter's Prayer - Assassino Contratado
programme.desc: Jules, um assassino profissional, vai contra as ordens dos seus chefes e acaba a proteger Ella, a jovem que tinha sido contratado para matar. Assinalados para morrer, Jules e Ella formam uma aliança que coloca em risco as suas vidas.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: O Feitiço do Tempo
programme.desc: Phil, o apresentador do boletim meteorológico de um canal, é enviado a Punxstawnwey para fazer a reportagem do Dia da Marmota. Na viagem de volta, Phil e a equipa são surpreendidos por uma tempestade que os obriga a voltar à cidade. Na manhã seguinte, ouve na rádio o mesmo programa do dia anterior.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: Amar Pablo e Odiar Escobar
programme.desc: A história da ascensão e queda do senhor da droga colombiano, Pablo Escobar, fundador do cartel de Medellín, contada pela sua glamorosa amante Virgínia Vallejo, já então uma jornalista conhecida com o seu próprio programa de televisão.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala
programme.desc: Mollie é uma mãe solteira à procura do pai perfeito para o seu filho. Mas Mickey, o bebé, vai fazer tudo para que a sua mãe perceba que o companheiro e pai ideal está mesmo ao seu lado.

programme.title: 21: A Última Cartada
programme.desc: Para pagar o curso de Medicina, Ben, um sobredotado do MIT, tenta fazer dinheiro em jogos de cartas. Ele acaba por se juntar à equipa secreta do seu professor de matemática, que, contando cartas e usando um complexo sistema de sinais, consegue "quebrar" vários casinos.

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Depois de 20 anos fora de Edimburgo, Mark Renton está de regresso à Escócia, o único lugar a que alguma vez chamou casa. À sua espera estão os velhos amigos: Spud, Sick Boy e Begbie. Muito mudou, mas muito ficou na mesma...

programme.title: Nightcrawler - Repórter na Noite
programme.desc: Lou Bloom é um jovem desesperado por trabalho, que descobre o alucinante mundo do crime de Los Angeles. Ao encontrar um grupo de freelancers que filmam casos de polícia, Lou entra no perigoso submundo do jornalismo criminal, onde uma sirene pode valer muitos dólares.

programme.title: Catwoman
programme.desc: Patience Phillips trabalha na Hedare Beauty, uma gigantesca companhia de cosméticos. No entanto, quando descobre inadvertidamente um segredo, é apanhada no meio de uma sórdida conspiração. Morta pela sua patroa, Patience renasce transformada em "Catwoman" e dotada de poderes sobrenaturais.

programme.title: Super-Homem
programme.desc: O planeta Krypton está perdido. Para salvar a sua raça da extinção Jor-El envia o seu filho bebé num foguete para o planeta Terra. Já adulto, para mascarar as suas capacidades e a sua verdadeira identidade, assume o disfarce de Clark Kent, um jornalista tímido e desastrado, que é o Super-Homem.

programme.title: Super-Homem II: A Aventura Continua
programme.desc: Super-Homem enfrenta três criminosos do planeta Krypton, o seu planeta natal. Tal como ele, Non, Ursa e Zod são dotados de incríveis poderes e, quando se aliam a Lex Luthor, quase dominam a Terra. Entretanto, o Super-Homem tinha decidido abdicar dos seus poderes para poder casar com Lois Lane.

programme.title: Super-Homem III
programme.desc: Um génio consegue descobrir uma fórmula aproximada de Kryptonite. Este novo produto transforma Superman numa espécie de segundo Dr. Jekyll e Mr. Hyde.

programme.title: Super-Homem IV: Em Busca da Paz
programme.desc: Lex Luthor rouba de um museu um cabelo da cabeça do Super-Homem e usa-o para criar o Homem Nuclear, um androide que extrai a sua energia do Sol. O seu objetivo, claro, é usá-lo como arma para matar o Super-Homem, para que Luthor possa ficar livre para concretizar os seus planos maléficos.

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Rússia czarista, final do século XIX. Anna é casada com Alexei Karenin, um destacado oficial. Mas tudo muda quando conhece o irresistível conde Vronsky, que altera a visão que ela tem de si e do mundo. Porém, o caso amoroso torna-se conhecido e Karenin sofre com as humilhações da opinião pública.

programme.title: Tróia
programme.desc: Na Grécia Antiga, Paris, príncipe de Tróia, seduz Helena, a rainha de Esparta, mas essa paixão desencadeia uma guerra de proporções inimagináveis. Por seu lado, Menelaus, o rei de Esparta, pede ao irmão Agamemnon, rei de Micenas, que reúna o povo grego para vingar a honra da família.

programme.title: O Décimo Círculo
programme.desc: Daniel Stone, um autor de BD, é casado com a professora universitária Laura. A filha de ambos, Trixie, é uma aluna inteligente e popular do primeiro ano do secundário. Quando Trixie diz ter sido violada pelo ex-namorado, os acontecimentos irão pôr à prova lealdades e ligações de todos os envolvidos.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Intenções Criminosas
programme.desc: O corpo de um advogado cujos casos inspiraram uma série de livros de sucesso é encontrado na praia e Billie Blessing tem de deslindar o enredo antes que a pessoa errada pague pelo crime.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Expiação
programme.desc: Verão de 1935. A família Tallis vive tranquilamente na sua mansão. Além disso, a pequena Briony já descobriu a sua vocação: quer ser romancista. Mas quando, do alto dos seus 13 anos, surpreende a irmã Cecilia com o filho do caseiro, Robbie, a sua reação ciumenta e ingénua vai provocar uma tragédia.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Abondance de Biens Ne Nuit Pas

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Ce Qui Ne Tue Pas Rend Plus Fort
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alleypat"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny French detective series","reviewBody":"It's funny in subtle ways. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. As a mom, I can totally relate to Renoir's domestic delimmas interfering with work, and work interfering with her home life. I watch on Amazon Prime with subtitles. I highly recommend this show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: O Amor nos Tempos de Cólera
programme.desc: Florentino, rejeitado pela bela Fermina quando era jovem, dedica a maior parte da sua vida adulta a relações carnais, numa tentativa desesperada de curar o seu coração partido.

programme.title: Guerra de Casamentos
programme.desc: Depois de um organizador de festas gay descobrir que o irmão está por trás do discurso do governador contra o casamento entre homossexuais, decide fazer greve para exigir direitos iguais.

programme.title: A Paixão de Shakespeare
programme.desc: Atormentado pelas dívidas, por um bloqueio criativo e pelos ensaios: as coisas não podiam estar a correr pior para o jovem William Shakespeare. O dramaturgo encontra inspiração em Viola De Lesseps, prometida a um lorde. A paixão é inevitável e, em vez da prometida comédia, escreve "Romeu e Julieta".

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Peggy Sue Casou-se
programme.desc: Peggy Sue é uma mulher de meia-idade, deprimida pela sua recenté separação com o marido. Na festa do 25º aniversário da sua graduação escolar, reúne-se com os antigos companheiros, que lhe contam como vai a vida de cada um.

programme.title: Vida Interrompida
programme.desc: Susanna é internada num hospital psiquiátrico, onde acaba por se tornar amiga de outras pacientes. Entre elas está Lisa, uma sociopata sedutora que tenta organizar uma fuga. O filme é baseado na experiência da escritora Susanna Kaysen, que esteve internada durante 18 meses, nos anos 60.

programme.title: Os Produtores
programme.desc: Um produtor da Broadway, à beira da falência, e um contabilista tímido concebem um projeto desonesto com o intuito de enriquecer rapidamente. O objetivo passa por criarem o pior espetáculo do mundo.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: A Teoria de Tudo
programme.desc: A extraordinária história de uma das mentes mais brilhantes dos nossos tempos, o astrofísico Stephen Hawking, e de duas pessoas que, por amor, desafiam todas as probabilidades. O filme é baseado nas memórias de Jane Hawking.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Paterson
programme.desc: Paterson é um motorista que conduz o mesmo turno do autocarro 23. Escuta as conversas dos seus passageiros, observa como interagem, como se movimentam e como respiram. Nas horas vagas, escreve poemas sobre os dias iguais que vive.

programme.title: Cometa
programme.desc: Situada num universo paralelo, a história de "Cometa" salta para trás e para a frente na linha de tempo, percorrendo seis anos da vida de um casal improvável, mas perfeitamente emparelhado.

programme.title: Danças Com Lobos
programme.desc: Em 1863, durante a Guerra Civil Americana, o Tenente John Dunbar é colocado num posto remoto, onde, pouco a pouco, vai criando amizade com os lobos e os índios, tornando-se uma aberração intolerável para o exército.

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie: Potência Máxima
programme.desc: O trio prepara-se para recuperar duas alianças: mas não são uns anéis quaisquer. Contêm informação encriptada que revela informações preciosas acerca de pessoas inseridas no programa de proteção de testemunhas. Quando as testemunhas começam a morrer, só os Anjos podem travar o assassino.

programme.title: Equipa Mortal
programme.desc: Melvin Smiley é um assassino neurótico e absolutamente banal que trabalha para dois chefes criminosos. Um deles propõe ao stressado Melvin que rapte Keiko, a filha mais nova de um abastado industrial japonês, sem saber que ela é a afilhada do outro.

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: Operação Swordfish
programme.desc: Stanley Jobson é um super hacker, que está em liberdade condicional após ter sido preso por lançar um vírus informático no sistema do FBI. Entretanto, é recrutado à força por uma unidade secreta de contraterrorismo chamada Black Cell.

programme.title: Warcraft: O Primeiro Encontro de Dois Mundos
programme.desc: O pacífico reino de Azeroth fica à beira da guerra quando a sua civilização enfrenta uma temível raça de invasores. Quando um portal se abre para ligar os dois mundos, dois heróis são colocados numa rota de colisão que irá decidir o futuro.

programme.title: G.I. Jane - Até ao Limite
programme.desc: Uma senadora consegue que a tenente Jordan O'Neil seja a primeira mulher autorizada a treinar na mais alta unidade de operações secretas americanas, os Navy Seals. Só que toda a gente espera que ela falhe e desista.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Encontro Diabólico
programme.desc: Um misterioso estranho inicia John numa viagem pelo crime, que irá transformar o marido e pai desiludido e com pouca força de vontade, num herói disposto a ir até onde for preciso para proteger a sua família.

Big Al fez inúmeros inimigos ao longo da vida, mas nenhum mais perigoso do que a sua grande paixão, Kat. Os dois vivem do crime, do tráfico de armas e de assaltos, mas Kat quer mais e começa a vender armas, entrando num mundo novo e do qual Big Al não faz parte.

programme.title: Bordertown - Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Uma jornalista do "Chicago Sentinel", filha de imigrantes mexicanos, investiga uma série de crimes de mulheres perto de fábricas americanas na fronteira de Juarez e El Paso.

programme.title: O Culpado
programme.desc: Asger Holm, operador de central de emergências, atende a chamada de uma mulher raptada. Mas quando o telefonema é subitamente interrompido, Asger inicia uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar esta mulher de uma situação que pode ser mais complexa...

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: Altamente Imperfeitos (V.P.)
programme.desc: Moxy é uma UglyDoll que sonha com o dia em que encontrará a sua criança. Com os amigos Wage, Babo e Ugly Bat, decide partir em busca da perfeição. Mas esta aventura só os levará a perceber que o que nos faz únicos é sermos altamente... imperfeitos!

programme.title: O Professor Chanfrado
programme.desc: O professor de genética Sherman Klump tem excesso de peso e, desesperado para conquistar a bela Carla, bebe um soro experimental para emagrecer. Sherman transforma-se em "Buddy Love", um conversador, energético e esbelto Don Juan!

programme.title: Warcraft: O Primeiro Encontro de Dois Mundos
programme.desc: O pacífico reino de Azeroth fica à beira da guerra quando a sua civilização enfrenta uma temível raça de invasores. Quando um portal se abre para ligar os dois mundos, dois heróis são colocados numa rota de colisão que irá decidir o futuro.

programme.title: Assalto Infernal
programme.desc: Gabe, um experiente montanhista de salvamento, é incumbido de resgatar um grupo que se perdeu nas montanhas. Mas esse grupo de pessoas é o mesmo que assaltou um avião do Estado e que procura guias conhecedores do terreno para os levar até às malas que contêm o dinheiro do assalto.

programme.title: Ronaldo
programme.desc: Filmado ao longo de 14 meses, com um acesso sem precedentes ao círculo íntimo de Cristiano Ronaldo, este é o primeiro filme oficial e autorizado do jogador português, que é uma das figuras mais célebres e mediáticas do futebol mundial.

programme.title: Empire State: O Assalto
programme.desc: Chris, segurança numa empresa de camiões, é persuadido por Eddie a assaltar o lugar. Após avanços e recuos, a dupla rouba a maior quantidade de dinheiro da história dos EUA. A equipa do FBI, liderada por Jay Ransone e Rudy Giuliani, pensa que o roubo é da responsabilidade de famílias do crime.

programme.title: Outcast - O Último Templário
programme.desc: Gallain, um guerreiro misterioso, junta-se aos filhos de um imperador chinês deposto para destronar o seu irmão cruel, que procura vê-los mortos. Jacob, que enfrenta os seus próprios "fantasmas", também se junta a eles, procurando salvar o reino e colocar o príncipe no trono.

programme.title: Inferno Vermelho
programme.desc: O inexpressivo agente russo Ivan Danko persegue um traficante de droga de Moscovo a Chicago, onde faz parceria com o agente Art Ridzik, cuja ética profissional é bastante mais relaxada.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello é um tipo de Nova Jérsia que se importa com o seu corpo, a família, os amigos, a sua igreja e, claro, mulheres. Os amigos até o tratam por Don Jon. Insatisfeito, embarca numa jornada em busca de uma vida sexual mais gratificante.

programme.title: Cross - O Poder dos Deuses
programme.desc: Graças a uma cruz Celta, Callan possui poderes incríveis que utiliza para combater o mal. Agora, acompanhado por uma equipa de especialistas em armas, Callan combate um implacável império em Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324","dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: The Walking Dead
The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Created by Frank Darabont. With Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride, Lauren Cohan, Josh McDermitt. Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1520211/","name":"The Walking Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU5NTcwNjktODIwMi00ZmZkLTk4ZWUtYzVjZWQ5ZTZjN2RlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1520211/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"multiplayerxgesource"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Compelling but it's time for this to DIE","reviewBody":"The zombie genre has been dragged into an endless time loop of reboots, reimagined visions, and bland DRIVEL. Like fortnite....zombies have become more of a TOOL than actual intriguing storytelling anymore. Come up with something original pick another LORE to explore. Zombie entertainment has become much like woke and cancel culture..... OLD AND BORING. programme.desc: Quando legiões de criaturas monstruosas, os Kaiju, emergem do mar, inicia-se uma guerra que pode conduzir ao Apocalipse. À beira da derrota, o destino da Humanidade acaba nas mãos de dois heróis improváveis: um ex-piloto e uma inexperiente estagiária.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="
